description: A Japanese goblin, ogre version with a touch of devil plus a dash of chtonic, vampiric prison guard.
A small, hunch-backed being vaguely reminiscent of a human.  Horned and red-skinned, it's not as weak as it looks, demonstrated by the  crude behavior, smashing anything that comes close.
//: These should be dumb, weak-ish to physical attacks, hit hard and be cowardly
